data.title: Westfield Elementary School
data.text:
Community invited to donate blood August 28 at Glen Crest

There are still open spots for the community blood drive that will be held 2 to 6:30 p.m. on August 28, at Glen Crest.

CCSD 89 schools will be closed September 2 for Labor Day

School will resume on a regular schedule on Tuesday, September 3.

Please turn in a Handbook Acknowledgement form for each child

All families must return the Handbook Acknowledgment Form, indicating you have reviewed the 2024-25 Handbook.

CCSD 89 back-to-school resources for 2024-25 school year

Information and resources to help your family feel ready for the start of the school year.

Board approves plan to allow for online learning on emergency days

The e-learning plan will give the district the option to use e-learning (online learning) in place of in-person learning on emergency days.

How to make lunch payments at CCSD 89 schools

Students will continue to pay for lunches with their school ID, which is linked to a MySchoolBucks account. Balances from the previous year have been rolled over.

CCSD 89 is hiring substitute nurses

With help from the district nurse and school principal, a substitute nurse ensures services are provided to maximize health in the school.

Glen Crest eighth graders Emma Waldbusser, Brooke Wills selected as Student Board Members

CCSD 89 is one of the few Illinois districts to have middle school students serving as Student Board Members.

Board will hold public hearing on August 19 to review e-learning proposal

At 7 p.m. on Monday, August 19, the Board of Education will hold a public hearing to review and adopt an e-learning program for the 2024-27 school years.

Families can now log in to PowerSchool to see teacher assignments

If you bookmarked PowerSchool last year, please note that the website address has changed.

Families were sent student fee invoices via email on August 7

The invoice will come from the email address: “do-not-reply@myschoolbucks.com”.

Information on fee waivers, free/reduced lunch

Information about how to submit forms for free/reduced lunch as well as fee waivers.

Date change for Glen Crest schedule/supply pick and Amazing Race

Sixth-grade supply pick-up and Amazing Race will be on August 19; 7th and 8th grade supply pick-up will be August 20.

Construction will limit access to some buildings over summer

Summer construction projects at CCSD 89 buildings began on Friday, May 31. Access to some buildings will be limited throughout the summer.

Glen Crest, Park View debut new logos

Using a consistent logo, color, and style helps all audiences quickly identify the school’s documents, staff, and property.

CASE special-education cooperative office has moved to Glendale Heights

CASE had previously been located in the CCSD 89 district office on Butterfield.

Eligible families can receive food assistance this summer

New federal nutrition program will provide cash for summer food to families with children eligible for free- or reduced-price meals.
